languages.text: {n}Обычно расслабленный и доброжелательный преподобный излучает ауру решимости и непоколебимого спокойствия.{/n} "Я ждал Вашу Светлость, и вот мы вновь стоим пред ликом Императора". {n}Его слова звучат негромко, но веско.{/n} "Ваша слава растет, но с нею — и недобрые слухи. Иной человек мог бы помыслить, что Вольный Торговец {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}отвернулся{/d} от света. Я же верю, что вы по-прежнему верн{mf|ый|ая} слуга Золотого Трона и вскоре развеете сомнения в вашей праведности".

{n}The usually relaxed and genial Confessor Adalbert now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words are quiet, but have weight to them.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are the ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}turned away{/d} from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."
languages.original_text: {n}Обычно расслабленный и доброжелательный преподобный излучает ауру решимости и непоколебимого спокойствия.{/n} "Я ждал Вашу Светлость, и вот мы вновь стоим пред ликом Императора". {n}Его слова звучат негромко, но веско.{/n} "Ваша слава растет, но с нею — и недобрые слухи. Иной человек мог бы помыслить, что Вольный Торговец {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}отвернулся{/d} от света. Я же верю, что вы по-прежнему верн{mf|ый|ая} слуга Золотого Трона и вскоре развеете сомнения в вашей праведности".

traits.locale_text: {n}The usually relaxed and genial reverend now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words, while not loud, sound compelling.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has turned away from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has turned away from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has turned away from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

{n}The usually relaxed and genial Confessor Adalbert now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words are quiet, but have weight to them.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are the ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}turned away{/d} from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

languages.text: {n}Le confesseur Adalbert est nimbé d'une aura de détermination et de calme imperturbable qui contraste avec son attitude habituellement détendue et avenante.{/n} « Je vous attendais, Votre Seigneurie. Nous voici rassemblés une fois de plus devant l'Empereur. » {n}Il s'exprime d'une voix douce, mais ses paroles sont lourdes de sens.{/n} « À mesure que votre renommée grandit, les rumeurs dommageables se font de plus en plus nombreuses. Il ne serait pas inconcevable que certains se mettent à croire que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} s'est {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}{mf|détourné|détournée}{/d} de la lumière. Cependant, je suis convaincu que vous continuez à servir loyalement le Trône d'Or et que vous dissiperez sans tarder tous les doutes relatifs à votre rectitude. »
languages.original_text: {n}The usually relaxed and genial Confessor Adalbert now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words are quiet, but have weight to them.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are the ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}turned away{/d} from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le révérend Adalbert est nimbé d'une aura de détermination et de calme imperturbable qui contraste avec son attitude habituellement détendue et avenante.{/n} « Je vous attendais, Votre Seigneurie. Nous voici rassemblés une fois de plus devant l'Empereur. » {n}Il s'exprime d'une voix douce, mais ses paroles sont lourdes de sens.{/n} « À mesure que votre renommée grandit, les rumeurs dommageables se font de plus en plus nombreuses. Il ne serait pas inconcevable que certains se mettent à croire que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} s'est {mf|détourné|détournée} de la lumière. Cependant, je suis convaincu que vous continuez à servir loyalement le Trône d'Or et que vous dissiperez sans tarder tous les doutes relatifs à votre rectitude. »

languages.text: {n}En contraste con su habitual talante cordial y relajado, el confesor Adalbert exhibe ahora un aire de determinación y serenidad impertérrita.{/n} «L{mf|e|a} estaba esperando, mi{mf|lord|lady}, y ahora henos aquí de nuevo, en presencia del Emperador». {n}Aunque habla en voz queda, sus palabras suenan ominosas.{/n} «Su fama l{mf|e|a} precede, pero también corren ciertos rumores funestos. Algunos creen, no sin motivo, que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}se ha desviado{/d} del camino de la luz. Yo, sin embargo, creo que su lealtad al Trono Dorado es incuestionable y que no tardará en disipar todo atisbo de duda acerca de su virtud».
languages.original_text: {n}The usually relaxed and genial Confessor Adalbert now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words are quiet, but have weight to them.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are the ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}turned away{/d} from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

traits.locale_text: {n}En contraste con su habitual talante cordial y relajado, el reverendo Adalbert exhibe ahora un aire de determinación y serenidad impertérrita.{/n} «L{mf|e|a} estaba esperando, mi{mf|lord|lady}, y ahora henos aquí de nuevo, en presencia del Emperador». {n}Aunque habla en voz queda, sus palabras suenan ominosas.{/n} «Su fama l{mf|e|a} precede, pero también corren ciertos rumores funestos. Algunos creen, no sin motivo, que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se ha desviado del camino de la luz. Yo, sin embargo, creo que su lealtad al Trono Dorado es incuestionable y que no tardará en disipar todo atisbo de duda acerca de su virtud».

languages.text: {n}原本率性、和蔼的告解神父阿达伯特，此刻却散发着信仰的气场，充满了坚定的决心。{/n}“我一直都在等着您，大人，我们终于再次站在了帝皇面前。”{n}他的话语很平静，但很有分量。{/n}“您的名声越来越响，但不利的谣言也越来越多。在某些人看来，行商浪人似乎已经{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}背离{/d}了光明的道路。不过，我一如既往地坚信您是黄金王座的忠实仆人。相信您很快就会消除那些怀疑的声音，不再会有人质疑您对正义的忠诚。”
languages.original_text: {n}The usually relaxed and genial Confessor Adalbert now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words are quiet, but have weight to them.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are the ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}turned away{/d} from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

traits.locale_text: {n}原本率性、和蔼的阿达伯特牧师，此刻却散发着信仰的气场，充满了坚定的决心。{/n}“我一直都在等着您，大人，我们终于再次站在了帝皇面前。”{n}他的话语很平静，但很有分量。{/n}“您的名声越来越响，但不利的谣言也越来越多。在某些人看来，行商浪人似乎已经背离了光明的道路。不过，我一如既往地坚信您是黄金王座的忠实仆人。相信您很快就会消除那些怀疑的声音，不再会有人质疑您对正义的忠诚。”

languages.text: {n}普段の落ち着いた優しい聴罪師アダルバートは、 今や決然としたオーラを放ち、平静を装っている。{/n}「あなたをお待ちしておりました、陛下。また、私達は皇帝の前に立つことになったのです」{n}彼は静かに喋っているが、言葉自体が重い。{/n}「あなたの名声は高まっているが、悪い噂も増えています。自由開拓者が光から{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}遠ざかってしまった{/d}と言う者がいても、不思議ではないです。しかし、私は、あなたがこれまでと同じように黄金の玉座に忠実な下僕であり、あなたの正しさについての疑念をすぐに払拭してくれると信じています」
languages.original_text: {n}The usually relaxed and genial Confessor Adalbert now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words are quiet, but have weight to them.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are the ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}turned away{/d} from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

traits.locale_text: {n}普段の落ち着いた優しいアダルバートは、 今や決然としたオーラを放ち、平静を装っている。{/n}「あなたをお待ちしておりました、陛下。また、私達は皇帝の前に立つことになったのです」{n}彼は静かに喋っているが、言葉自体が重い。{/n}「あなたの名声は高まっているが、悪い噂も増えています。ローグトレーダーが光から遠ざかってしまったと言う者がいても、不思議ではないです。しかし、私は、あなたがこれまでと同じように黄金の玉座に忠実な下僕であり、あなたの正しさについての疑念をすぐに払拭してくれると信じています」

languages.text: {n}Der üblicherweise entspannte und freundliche Konfessor Adalbert strahlt nun eine Aura der Entschlossenheit und vollkommenen Ruhe aus.{/n} "Ich habe Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} erwartet, und nun stehen wir wieder vor dem Imperator." {n}Seine Worte sind leise, aber gewichtig.{/n} "Es wäre nicht undenkbar, dass jemand zu dem Schluss kommt, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} habe sich vom Licht {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}abgewandt{/d}. Ich dagegen glaube, Ihr dient dem Goldenen Thron so loyal wie eh und je und werdet bald jeden Zweifel an Eurer Rechtschaffenheit ausräumen."
languages.original_text: {n}The usually relaxed and genial Confessor Adalbert now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words are quiet, but have weight to them.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are the ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}turned away{/d} from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der üblicherweise entspannte und freundliche Reverend Adalbert strahlt nun eine Aura der Entschlossenheit und vollkommenen Ruhe aus.{/n} "Ich habe Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} erwartet, und nun stehen wir wieder vor dem Imperator." {n}Seine Worte sind leise, aber gewichtig.{/n} Es wäre nicht undenkbar, dass jemand zu dem Schluss kommt, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} habe sich vom Licht abgewendet. Ich dagegen glaube, Ihr dient dem Goldenen Thron so loyal wie eh und je und werdet bald jeden Zweifel an Eurer Rechtschaffenheit ausräumen."

languages.text: {n}Genelde rahat ve güler yüzlü olan Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert, kararlı ve durağan bir sakinlik havası yayıyor.{/n} "Ben de sizi bekliyordum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bir kez daha İmparator'un huzurunda bulunuyoruz." {n}Sözcüklerini sessizce ancak belli bir ağırlığa sahip bir şekilde sarf ediyor.{/n} "Namınız yayılıyor ancak aynı zamanda bazı nahoş söylentiler de öyle. Bazılarının Hür Tacir'in ışığa {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}yüz çevirdiği{/d} sonucuna varması çok da akıl dışı olmaz. Lakin ben sizin her zamanki gibi Altın Taht'ın sadık bir hizmetkârı olduğunuza ve doğruluğunuza dair bütün şüpheleri çok yakında bertaraf edeceğinize inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The usually relaxed and genial Confessor Adalbert now exudes an aura of resolve and unperturbed calmness.{/n} "I have been waiting for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and now we are standing in the Emperor's presence again." {n}His words are quiet, but have weight to them.{/n} "Your fame is growing, but so are the ill rumours. It would not be unthinkable for some to conclude that the Rogue Trader has {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}turned away{/d} from the light. I, however, believe you are as loyal a servant of the Golden Throne as ever, and that you will soon dispel any doubt as to your righteousness."
